TopicTitle: The History of the Nemesis System

Articles.Content:
The History of Nemesis
Nemesis was made as a pair to Kerbol, As a small brown dwarf. Then, due to unknown forces, it was whisked away just after its birth. then, again, due to unknown forces it ignited with as much light as a supernova. Then, as a star, it caught many rogue planet's and became what we know as the Nemesis System.
The history of Kersopia
Kersopia was a dark and cold little thing until the great Iridian impact happened. As it hit a great gush of water and dirt spurt out creating what we know as Xandar and Iridia. then another impact happened known as the desperation Comet, Creating all the deserts on Kersopia.

The history of Wintersong

Wintersong was originally an asteroid that was pulled in by Kersopia's SOI. Then, for some reason, It just turned to ice and sand.

The History of Bastion

Bastion was a planet orbiting kerbol at one point, but then got pulled away from kerbol by Nemesis.
